transcript:
so why have a relationship at all like
why not just decide to be single I think
the most important most meaningful
reason for a relationship is this it's
finding someone who accepts you fully
Flaws and All without the makeup your

your deodorant because when we're

back to you of how to love and fully
accept yourself as you are
